com.google.earth.search.api
Class PluginPreferences

java.lang.Object
  com.google.earth.search.api.PluginPreferences
Direct Known Subclasses:
KmlPluginPreferences
public abstract class PluginPreferences
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class for preferences for the KML returned by the various plugins.

Method Detail

init

protected static void init(java.lang.Class<?> theClass,
                           java.lang.String propertiesFileName,
                           PluginPreferences preferences,
                           java.lang.String preferencesfileName,
                           Logger logger)
Init the properties for the specified preferences by loading them from properties files. In general, this may be a resource associated with the implementing class, or an override file in getomcat/conf.

Parameters:
theClass - the class object for the caller, the default properties must be embedded as a resource file with the class.
propertiesFileName - the name of the resource file.
preferences - the preferences to load.
preferencesfileName - the name of the preferences file.
logger - optional logger to log errors.

getPreference

public java.lang.String getPreference(java.lang.String key)
Gets the preference by name/key.

Parameters:
key -
Returns:
the string value of the preference, and null if the key does not exist.

getPreferenceLower

public java.lang.String getPreferenceLower(java.lang.String key)
Gets the lower-case value of the preference by name/key.

Parameters:
key -
Returns:
the lower-case string value of the preference, and null if the key does not exist.

getBoolean

public java.lang.Boolean getBoolean(java.lang.String key)
Gets the boolean preference by name/key.

Parameters:
key -
Returns:
the boolean value of the preference (must match "true" case-insensitive. Return false if the key does not exist.

getProperties

public java.util.Properties getProperties()
Return the preferences as a Properties object.

Returns:
the preferences properties object

Override

public void Override(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> overrides)
Override the preferences using a Map of key-value strings. Only keys which exist in the current preferences are overridden.

Parameters:
overrides - the map of key-value pairs used to override the current preferences. If the map is null, no overrides occur.

setProperties

public void setProperties(java.util.Properties overrides)
Set the preferences using a Properties object.

Parameters:
overrides - the map of key-value pairs used to override the current preferences. If the map is null, no overrides occur.

setPreference

public void setPreference(java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.String value)
Set the preference key-value pair.

Parameters:
key - is the key for the preference
value - is the value for this key
